Reviews.Title: “Nice little hotel near Termini”
Reviews.Author: MTNR_FAN
Reviews.Content: hotel fantastic location close main square main street easy walking distance places staff hotel friendly helpful received room upgrade travelling honeymoon suite amazing found breakfast buffet really good meals restaurant great well would highly recommend hotel anyone travelling amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Anne B”
Reviews.Author: anne63Preston
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 nights business trip say hotel made otherwise awful trip one like people said rooms small ideal one person clean serviced everyday made good use room whilst staying room time long city shower amazing room well stocked mini bar room service menu made good use food arrived 15 minutes lovely food restaurant hotel really lovely quite reasonably priced heard people party complain breakfast scrambled eggs fried eggs etc however thought breakfast great selection hot cold suit everyone lastly say staff brilliant friendly willing anything location wise get better itâ€™s located right edge dam square thereâ€™s tram stop literally outside hotel bars restaurants could ever wish thought hotel brilliant go back personal trip next year

Reviews.Title: “Adequate hotel in good location for Termini station.”
Reviews.Author: cliffy60
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights end tour coming early could get room hours members group waited till 4 oclock rooms nonsmoking part lucky got one 2 rooftop rooms view sky air though 13 steep steps roomy large bathroom newly odd hair dryer clean quiet location wonderful breakfast good staff pleasant helpful great central location know paid included tour pricey moved bb see review last 3 nights

Reviews.Title: “A Perfect Choice”
Reviews.Author: Yasemin8
Reviews.Content: girlfriend booked hotel expedia based hotels website reviews site expecting terms location rooms yes small one look outside building see old design left little room large rooms without changing entire actually fine wanted clean comfortable bright quiet despite location dam rooms silent unless opened windows room second floor facing department store corner great place lunch breakfast stores cafe 4th floor overlooks room small balcony full size patio doors great look crowds take sights sounds smells amsterdam airconditioning great help quite humid night shower room also small quite dated style notice reception saying updating long problem restaurant ate first last night stay food much better could imagine cost two course drinks cost us 65 euro believe food service quality would way 100 anything close mixed welcoming staff polite friendly helpful times arrived around 9 expected leave bags hotel till check receptionist first checked see could get room one ready able check straight away time confirmed details reached room bags already could start holiday 930 whole good one would recommend hotel couple tips amsterdam use train clean cheap ann go early late groups school kids day make long queues rainy days visit heineken drink gift included entry fee 11 euros also worth view amsterdam madame

Reviews.Title: “A different kind of 4 stars hotel”
Reviews.Author: tinergetic
Reviews.Content: hotel smart perfect location rooms pleasant clean would hotel

Reviews.Title: “A fantastic place to stay ...”
Reviews.Author: holo69
Reviews.Content: 4 nights part group tour time mainly yes rooms small streets outside crowded rooms central cities small esp well clean bathroom full size hotel steps dam center city perfect spot sightseeing also perfect catching train day dining room nice breakfasts esp enjoyable best part staff spoke perfect english could helpful

Reviews.Title: “BOOK THIS HOTEL!!!”
Reviews.Author: Salvey
Reviews.Content: brilliant hotel great location everything within walking distance rooms bit small side stays room day anyway husband doesnt like impressed ones also said pillows comfortable ever hotel breakfast brilliant didnt need eat lunch staff helpful polite negative toilet rolls bit hard side go steakhouse best steak ever chicken good also find way hard rock cafe near leidseplein wonderful food lovely staff like rock music cant beat another good trip heineken museum

Reviews.Title: “comfortable convenient located hotel”
Reviews.Author: Vermeer123
Reviews.Content: wife checked hotel amsterdam 5 night stay april 2007 first visit amsterdam wanted stay city centre area makes convenient sight seeing train station tram system arrived hotel lobby small decorated front desk personnel polite checked room size walkin closet may slight however place room set suitcase trip moving room walked shower bathtub room narrow turned around suddenly would half sink counter way person could enter bathroom navigate staying room thought complaining management get another room however decided rooms hotel size plus side room clean rated hotel 2 rather 1 however lot hotels amsterdam city centre would look stay considering staying

Reviews.Title: “Great choice !”
Reviews.Author: lenIsrael
Reviews.Content: stayed three nights early april 2007 main feature hotel location cant get central amsterdam within walking distance tourist attractions city centre commented rooms small mine exception although window rooms apparently lack airconditioning remote controlled individual unit room however working quite sometimes room would change temperature suddenly without changes made airconditioner place spotless internet access available room extra cost per 24 hours using laptop apparently tv room also internet would stay mainly close everything hotel good shape clean

Reviews.Title: “Great position, quiet & clean, efficient staff, free wi-fi”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer C
Reviews.Content: room clean requested two single beds pushed together little room separate location awesome right new jordaan red light district easy walking distance central station metros water taxis sign front desk anyone caught using premises would immediately police would called thought interesting hair dryer room definitely little tall side manage since came box wall lift end attached wall little funky worked cool place stay location location location

Reviews.Title: “good hotel close to temini”
Reviews.Author: casatorres55
Reviews.Content: 10 minutes walk station best way get airport much much cheaper go station straight damrak right hand side u check bags check till 3pm check 11am quite freindly staff rooms small good back street got wall room double booked walked whilst bed apology given staff good shower small bathroom bath bath got double bed 2 single mattresses likes gap mini bar touch fear crazy prices breakfast 810 worth bother egg bacon make toast croissants apple yogurt slow service tea coffee wanted charge coffee 2 euro must say luggage well cared check theres free safe room wardrobe space small either hot cold tv mostly english expensive adult channels amsterdam large impressive buildings lots bikes trams u must go museum excellent 10 euro near park worth walk round 4 drinks cost u 15 25 euro beware nearer square district u expensive really quite chilly rained half time u really need good walking legs comfy shoes cant stress enough went canal trip ok much exciting info given oh lovely ends lol red light area ok main streets seedy side streets whatever u prefer honest many clubs 25 euro hard look like bored hear shops excellent theres lots bars cafes etc mcdonalds bad service toilets steep careful u pay 20 50 cents even mcdonalds get airport early big quite good walking never saw coffee shops dont sell coffee sell u want coffee u need tea shop smell putting u walk good weekend hotel ok excellent location

Reviews.Title: “Delightful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: sarahpWiltshire
Reviews.Content: returned friends could check hotel fully booked impressed think lucky escape saw rooms good value money 4 hotel like 23 thing going central location

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, worth the price.”
Reviews.Author: eseliv
Reviews.Content: booked hotel via internet already free flights never amsterdam wasnt really sure location wise booking happened hotel couldnt better location right corner dam square damrak main road station restaurants fantastic room 4th floor balconies windows overlooking dam square couldnt asked better staff helpful even requested late check sorted problem charge even though stated hotel guide extra charge would made rooms quite small adequate long weekend aircon somewhat efficient weather boiling outside quite welcome beds comfy bathroom good enough hotel didnt bar although public restaurant downstairs food looked quite expensive used minibar wanted wasnt expensive like rest amsterdam beer example amsterdam fantastic place enough see took trip round canals went various odd museums wont find anywhere else red light district also must see 300 coffee shops around place smell wherever go best place found 2 min walk hotel bar upstairs coffee shop downstairs wonderful outside terrace could drink smoke required cant wait go back would definately stay hotel would recommend anyone everyone friendly

Reviews.Title: “quiet and convenient to train station”
Reviews.Author: DocRB
Reviews.Content: saw hotel available euros two nights hotel paid 30 euros deposit net due pay euros arrival could imagine surprise guy reception said wanted 400 euros said 30 euros paid deposit booking company refused pay gave room price given got room small thought pricey really didnt even think using phone restaurant due extortionate prices location second none overall pricey

Reviews.Title: “2nd visit, just as good as I remembered”
Reviews.Author: Kath60
Reviews.Content: cant really fault hotel 5 minute walk central station right door step dam square hotel clean quiet bustle street outside got upgraded superior room standard far gather meant 2 chairs table extra disappointing bit room bed 2 singles pushed together didnt eat hotel room plenty cafes restaurants area budget food would recommend hotel yes would location central fantastic buildings surrounding dont think hotel tries clean comfortable got good location

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Fans123
Reviews.Content: hotel fantastic rooms small find anywhere central amsterdam right dam square end damrak means local sites quick stroll away breakfast service amenities cannot faulted would recommend check view room

Reviews.Title: “Great choice”
Reviews.Author: caraandrew
Reviews.Content: booked 3 rooms via priceline contacted hotel directly asking could rooms close together replied immediately reservations department got back letting know would try put us together offered us upgrade 31 per night per room accepted glad since saw regular room later tiny pretty sure luggage would fit took train schipol central station walked straight road hotel 7 mins away check prompt desk people friendly rooms ok dark since back view size rooms amazing like toiletries came hotel however shampoo felt like laundry would recommend taking supply also warning careful sign wireless internet told open internet page follow instructions sign internet well turned laptop came signed lost signal right turns hotel offered charges since connection bad get access except first mins needed credit card number beds comfortable toilet paper felt like location unbeatable middle tourist section saw crowne plaza marriott located glad red bid since like center touristy things literally block away could 5 mins loved coffee shop people amsterdam friendly cant begin say enough remember buy water supermarket near madame much cheaper anywhere else charged city taxes euros per night per room room service quick efficient come back see housekeeping kept bag trash bathroom sink forgotten remove however someone came seconds called front desk kept electric kettle rooms cups coffees teas sugar thing like iron room told would need go ironing room third floor felt also asked could keep one room till 1pm check two rooms since flight 5pm planning leave hotel around 2pm desk agent quick say nice would problem anyway good hotel compared 4 star us would recommend hotel remember might good idea take upgrade offered reasonable

Reviews.Title: “Very good if you need a hotel near termini”
Reviews.Author: Pappone78
Reviews.Content: bumped hotel lovely amsterdam feel room amsterdam red hotel located dam right next noisy smelly mcdonalds time leave bought tickets shuttle theres sign lobby states pick hotel tickets 1015 flight asked shuttle would pull front told yes true shuttle picks across dam ill communication simply poor customer service received hotel missed flight ended spending another euros dollars finding another hotel night even though hotel rated 4 star obviously people dont make stay better places dont care service pick place run fast another one also find interesting find customer service link complain ask

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic time!!”
Reviews.Author: Hansi1959
Reviews.Content: stayed red weekend get away flew took train centraal station walked hotel even though freezing amsterdam walk quick hotel easy find hotel located right next dam square tram stops directly front hotel made easy access part city also made easy wander around still find way back since located dam square hotel ok upgraded jr suite extra â‚¬20 night would recommend room conference room bed ceiling floor windows looking onto brick wall ac unit building staff helpful going rude eat restaurant cant review based price location definitely stay hotel amsterdam reason 4 rating review fact suite conference room complete screen extra office chairs would recommend upgrading jr suite also charge everything room need tea like suggest bringing along

Reviews.Title: “A very welcoming and enjoyable stay. Fantastic service and 2 mins walk to main station”
Reviews.Author: Amester84
Reviews.Content: husband travel regularly business leisure would highly recommend hotel anyone visiting amsterdam long get good deal price cant go wrong location perfect right dam square seconds away royal palace madame also recommend museums tours shopping restaurants red light district staff friendly extremely helpful would advise plan sleeping mornings dont forget put disturb sign cleaning staff early hotel english speaking tv news entertainment channels available tv little flatscreen choice movies fairly good negative point room small saw standard comfortable room dont know much bigger superior rooms get choice ask room bath bathroom bigger shower attached anyway double bed two single beds pushed together things could fit room desk chair aside room clean completely outdated reasonably quiet perfect falling asleep big day booked room online around per night half average price quoted site time way way way price web site considering excellent location staff price size room easy overlook get good deal hotel prepared room small absolutely disappointed would definitely stay helpful tips 1 english name hotel red found easier say dutch name 2 shuttle bus airport costs 12 euro per person drops across square hotel taxi 35 euro careful taxi drivers amsterdam try con train central station around 4 euro 1520 minute walk main street hotel cheap option little baggage 3 breakfast hotel 11 euro sounds expensive thats youll end paying similar setting elsewhere area however restaurant food isnt great advise exploring neighbourhood meals

Reviews.Title: “My home away from home in Rome”
Reviews.Author: sgbiedron
Reviews.Content: returned first visit amsterdam break booked red package received excellent value money paid room large spacious comfortable king size bed sitting area buffet breakfast good included package price one evening meal included also package choices usual menu cheap limited selection one often deals food excellent actually decided return following evening criticism forgot travel adaptor one small charge reception small charge 10 euros final bill good trip would certainly return

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed and definitely not 4 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cadamsky
Reviews.Content: close termini station convenient get around anywhere city staff excellent especially lady concierge unfortunately didnt catch name went beyond make arrangements city excursions room clean although bathroom smell little sometimes shower stall cramped even guy like beds comfortable even gave us special pillows upon request breakfast okay scrambled eggs breads jams internet free overall would definitely recommend hotel anyone wants stay city center rome

Reviews.Title: “Good little hotel, shame we couldn't stay there the entire time we had booked!”
Reviews.Author: Mdcher
Reviews.Content: fantastic location clean helpful staff basic way really nice ask want asked boiled eggs day one every morning done soon walked need ask english movie channel news channel tip airport get bus instead train bus return 6 euros get bus termini station look left see hotel hotel turn left via cross one road hotel right easy return trip take ticket office 20 mins leave give card place easy much cheaper

Reviews.Title: “Not a bad hotel, but expensive for what you get”
Reviews.Author: honkiehoteler
Reviews.Content: booked hotel kind free really nothing complain location easy walking distance station rated 4 star european country would struggle get 3 stars rooms small adequate city wants stay moment longer need cleanliness could better eg dusty glasses rooms needed another use fan bathroom working air conditioning noisy either baked depending breakfast buffet good beware bacon shoe staff pleasant efficient mini bar room reasonably priced certainly compared outrageous prices charged uk nothing major complain leaving tip youre travelling couple family get hotel order taxi return trip airport much expensive train route city take past many great sights perfect way leave

Reviews.Title: “OK hotel close to the main train station”
Reviews.Author: ship44
Reviews.Content: clean comfortable great location stayed 2 days visiting roma daughters senior trip hotel staff friendly helpful room clean throughout stay ever roma didnt know expect surprised reading posts though station rough quiet seemed safe side problems walked night yes double 2 singles around big deal breakfast ok shouldnt waste food budget hotel anyway would definitely stay without hesitation

Reviews.Title: “Overbooks Even on Prepaid Rooms”
Reviews.Author: travel2010000
Reviews.Content: thought one type 4 stars hotel seems wrong real 4 stars hotel far travel 9 countries within 5 years stayed many hotels hotel italy cannot say royal court would really fit level first would specifically recommend hotel winter period heating system based air conditioning bathrooms heated bathroom made marble floor walls problem it’s almost like problem fact provide sleepers thought coming 4 stars hotel take sleepers us imagine get sort heated room freezing bathroom marble floor sit toilet reminded read paying 90 seemed bit breakfast ok options including scrambled eggs bacon yogurt salami yellow cheese different fruits coffee tea juices chocolate cake compared royal breakfast one pretty staff excellent especially would left checking italian guy believe italian seemed bit would probably go rome many things see visit sure chose different hotel time unpleasant details disappointed talk anymore sure worth money

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: handsoff22
Reviews.Content: american 4 star hotel way short reserved deluxe room standard room lacked walking space entrance bathroom bed although queen size took 90 room hotel provides basic wifi satellite tv wifi good hotel full tv lacked variety provided one english channel bbc 9 channels either italian french movie channel however offered movies english youd watch around 2 4 breakfast average typical cold cut sandwich fruits offered basement dinning room located positive thing say conveniently located street termini station made worth effort line take sites line b blue line take 2 spots train station also provides train airport however hotel provides shuttle service airport stay total 3 days must ensure included make reservation

Reviews.Title: “excellent value, situation, good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Bubbee2
Reviews.Content: second trip rome stayed situated walk termini perfect us went three friends time 18 didnt go rome anything like went good time place fitted bill perfectly booked lastminutecom got great deal start arrived cheerful receptionist welcomed us began check us invited us sit relax completed process called informed upgrading us free charge delux room instead standard room went room perfect enough room wanted comfortable beds everything clean let fact jacuzzi didnt work could deal easily went every night rome found easy get taxi back termini walk via usually home around 12 fine walked straight one night came home 2am meeting talking two local romans got back hotel found main gate locked however simply rang receptionist came smiling let us wished good nights sleep staff polite went way make us happy number occasions definitely going back hotel side note anyone going rome soon sure go cafe meal drink nice man made us feel welcome situated top via fairly cheap get taxi bus goes straight pass well

Reviews.Title: “just awful...”
Reviews.Author: antoineandre
Reviews.Content: choose hotel location near main train station termini 5 minutes walk nice quiet street side station safe good room comfortable good beds nice lovely girl reception need something near station would recommend one dont mind walking walk mayor attractions city otherwise take bus metro termini

Reviews.Title: “Great Location - Fair Price”
Reviews.Author: hows_AL
Reviews.Content: stayed four nights early december first time rome hotel royal court couldnt easier find took airport shuttle airport dropped us outside termini station hotel located street across road station dont let hotel least three minute walk street extremely quiet reception staff friendly extremely helpful able check room early room spacious clean bathroom pretty powerful shower always appreciated didnt eat hotel reception staff helpful us direction local restaurants hotel isnt located particularly touristy part town never felt unsafe walking around night short walk termini meant always ten minutes main sights vatican city colosseum etc negatives 1 bed two single beds pushed together however confirm booking three days checking didnt expect anything different 2 room us wasnt soundproof im sure due wood however noticed early morning sound furniture moving despite hotel royal court excellent value money would recommend everyone

Reviews.Title: “Very close to the train station”
Reviews.Author: dks61885
Reviews.Content: first visit rome situation couldnt better close termini safe quiet location several close eateries breakfast good wonderful coffee room clean bed comfortable water hot wifi worked well staff helpful knowledgeable good spoken english establishment everything needed

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: manras
Reviews.Content: first time hotel booked room quite small bed hard first night told reception us much bigger better room bed well decorated throughout b b breakfast good staff helpful friendly plenty powerful hot water shower web site says charge wifi left top home got said free slightly dissapointing full day touristy things would nice come back meal nice bar lounge area doesnt one thats negative thing say royal court rest positives nice hotel within walking distance termini airport buses

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: Yarra1
Reviews.Content: returned short break rome stayed royal court hotel lovely stay well placed sights close termini station staff helpful especially lady reception checked early evening showed interest return hotel day return visited day breakfast enjoyable good choice cooked bacon eggs fresh fruit cereal etc room clean comfortable although bed hard side bathroom clean jacuzzi bath ideal relaxing busy day sightseeing

Reviews.Title: “Great budget choice for those using public transportation.”
Reviews.Author: travelwith2teens_8
Reviews.Content: looking inexpensive hotel near termini station hotel perfectly fits bill nothing fancy clean close termini station staff friendly wife forgot hotel called hotel kept returned back week later returned roma catch flight back home hotel close termini train station piece luggage wheels walk termini helpful plan travel rome use subway also tourist hop hop buses stops near termini station wifi free worked fine hotel free breakfast lot places eat close would recommend

Reviews.Title: “Nice Boutique Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ki82
Reviews.Content: nice people especially reception convenient termini station price good big negative dirty wood floor appeared vacuumed long time would go dirty floor shower heads two rooms spray water everywhere room would quiet even business neighborhood

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: MKE1
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2010 couldnt fault returned year enjoyed location perfect arriving airport termini station 5 minutes walk away managed walk virtually everywhere hotel take comfy walking shoes easy hop onto metro termini visit places vatican city rooms spotlessly clean location quiet busy city breakfast usual help buffet style eggs bacon hot option someone mentioned like drink room bring travel kettle none room

Reviews.Title: “Great staff - Superb location”
Reviews.Author: CabbagesAhoy
Reviews.Content: lovely room fab bedding furnishings like morning tho take travel 4 hotel teacoffee making facilities didnt breakfast felt overpriced staff friendly location termini station central rome attractions 23 mins walk station 1520 mins walk coliseum trevi pantheon etc cheap okay romes standards

Reviews.Title: “Royal Court good value”
Reviews.Author: dan19460
Reviews.Content: pleased stayed hotel royal court reasonable price rome anyway couple blocks station able leave bags bellman arrival departure days room clean good repair reasonable size european hotel bathroom fine money feel received good value

Reviews.Title: “Good find!”
Reviews.Author: Friendship88
Reviews.Content: reservation recent trip europe never rome idea stay hotel clean nice safe area blocks metro arrived train hotel 2 blocks termini station quiet part breakfast nice enjoyed much staff spoke english went way make stay great whenever rome return royal court

Reviews.Title: “Best place if you're planning to visit all Rome's attractions on foot”
Reviews.Author: nalbr027
Reviews.Content: arrived train airport hotel two blocks away pleasantly greeted reception manager assisted us warmly room much expected bathroom huge stocked products breakfast buffet things meats fruit cereals croissants reception manager nice guy think extremely helpful loved hotel kindness staff would definitely stay recommend highly

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel close to Termini”
Reviews.Author: dickensdad
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights royal court perfect hotel located minutes train station metro room floor clean spacious wifi important staff great friendly food service breakfast room also good

Reviews.Title: “A Great Little Hotel. Enthusiatic Staff”
Reviews.Author: alanw888
Reviews.Content: stayed days hotel staff friendly helpful location close metro train station room clean spacious well done

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel”
Reviews.Author: sunny38
Reviews.Content: booked trip rome surprise trip husbands birthday everything great til got hotel room smelling strongly cleaning bathroom smelling like sewage used cleaning products smell smell unbearable requested change room told none available numerous conversations managed get different room however first minibar break bed unfortunately spend one night sleep one legs bed broken wait til following day handy man staff charge definitely solution interested pleasing looking customers total let shame really wanted trip memorable shame 4 starts stand used

Reviews.Title: “excellent choice”
Reviews.Author: magscarbin
Reviews.Content: arrived royal court four night stay travelled city airport train greeted news upgraded executive room another hotel problems rooms rain never found real reason overbooked tired make much fuss put taxi another hotel side station room hotel clean tired shabby given option moving back following morning decided considering knew royal court refurbished left luggage room went day evening returned royal court waiting us new room particularly end royal court turned excellent little hotel standard double room right size two us decent sized bathroom spotlessly clean decorated decent standard although colour scheme slightly unusual real complaint room lack storage space wardrobe hanging rail one shelf small drawer desk anything away addition open shelf bed side unit also bit issue lady next door loud voice seem blocked wall must something voice rarely heard companions side conversation breakfast would expect continental europe service staff good couple excellent restaurant recommendations girl reception afternoon evening although bit walk away surrounding area seemed fine safety wise hotel probably closer station platform airport train uses ratings ignore problems first night taking word control

Reviews.Title: “Depends what you want”
Reviews.Author: onmyholiday
Reviews.Content: bit late booking options limited generally decent hotel nice atmosphere usual standard hotel nice rooms authentic italian design want youre rome though small quite rather hard bed breakfast good enough choose location bad central close railway station still bit walk pleasant though get places gym werent price high get would stay

Reviews.Title: “Convenient for train station, little else to recommend it”
Reviews.Author: Gallivantingtheworld
Reviews.Content: typical bb clean fresh towels close main train station bit walk city centre selection good restaurants limited bit pricey rome standards average

Reviews.Title: “Great Small Friendly Clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: booked hotel arriving late night rome wanted somewhere close station safe sleep departing morning arrived hotel told problem hotel problem simply overbooked told would take sister hotel upgrade took sister hotel completely different area town upgraded placed smallest room sister hotel first thought would least give credit making arrangements however package room found comment card removed room made clear thing happened previous tired would fuss completely unacceptable rooms prepaid guaranteed

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Quaint, Friendly”
Reviews.Author: dm3880
Reviews.Content: booked 5 nights double room holiday believe best money value rome room clean service excellent location brilliant staff friendly problem hotel informed booking american express declined give card check paid great steak restaurant cafe make reservation first take tube termini station walking best steak long time

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: rmo
Reviews.Content: needed stay close station last leg trip early flight 3 days given rather seedy accomodations neighborhood within price range hotel park lovely place old small chose plan without breakfast cost considerably people desk extremely helpful friendly particularly young woman works afternoons free wifi room

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Darlee
Reviews.Content: excellent location arriving train easy access main tourist sights friendly helpful staff excellent breakfast big hotel dont expect enormous room lavish fittings everything works comfortable stay

Reviews.Title: “Not as nice as we had read about”
Reviews.Author: Jnbantle
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 3 days august could recommend hotel staff miserable rooms even though junior suite small poor condition moved rooms second room also breakfast room ground level dark musty way could hold 10 guests time lounge areas small courtyard frequented smokers lift broke twice sign lift mentioning quite look elsewhere wish stay biggest ripoff city ever

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: babylaw
Reviews.Content: hotel three short blocks away main train station roma termini offers great price breakfast good staff friendly location great two days windows like europe offer much way quiet night sufficient would recommend place friends considering good price offers

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place, Friendly Staff but Small Room”
Reviews.Author: YountvilleJoy
Reviews.Content: leaving tomorrow completed stay hotel hotel well located far termini station able walk sites planned staying rome hotel run arrived greeted right away staff attended luggage front desk took care checkin rooms well decorated clean breakfast buffet thing really disappointing room husband good night sleep stay bed suppose king size bed twin beds put together also bed hard rock felt like sleeping box spring price paid would liked good night sleep return rome many hotels area try another one

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: location excellent close termini station executive double room relatively roomy comfortable street noise problem windows closed even open street narrow one way busy night breakfast room small often crowded couple breakfast tables easily tables pushed close others breakfast fine kitchen staff helpful friendly reception staff mostly friendly great feature availability free mercedes transfer one way either airport staying 6 nights executive double room great way get fiumicino

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, don't let them switch you”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: small friendly location great access public transportation short walk termini restaurant located near excellent food welcomed eating bargain considering cost restaurants americans right serve excellent european style breakfast didnt spend lot time room rome beautiful waste second seeing found quiet clean english speaking locals seemed like genuine concern guests enjoy great budget

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC HOTEL!!!! Thank you Tripadvisor ++++++”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: returned one week stay hotel enjoyed stay rooms definitely small enough room bed although upgrade deluxe room bit money location excellent steps away termini train station number restaurants tourist attractions complaint hotel telephone room didnt work staff didnt address problem last day unfortunate overall staff attentive pleasant throughout stay breakfast included room basic pastries yogurt fruit convienent need quick bite eat getting going morning hotel perfect type traveler needs clean place sleep doesnt large american hotel chains also much cheaper types hotels visit rome would certainly consider returning hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights royal court june 2008 lovely hotel 500 yards termini located quiet side street location booking heard area around termini could dodgy problems hotel private quiet perfectly safe hotel spotlessly clean hotel staff friendly helpful continental breakfast fine problem wanted anything extra special colosseum forum via del corso 20 minute walk away termini close major sites easily accessible via metro could take either line b termini direct overall would highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place”
Reviews.Author: Jsmtraveler
Reviews.Content: hotel recommended us travel agent friend location excellent 500 walk romes central railway termini downside window open front hotel quite noisy however air con windows shut wouldnt know central rome really sets hotel apart staff excellent friendly helpful fast would stay shot

Reviews.Title: “Believe the Review and photos”
Reviews.Author: chicagoborn40
Reviews.Content: wife excellent city break rome staying 4 nights royal court chose hotel good tripadvisor feedback rome great city visit loved wonderful sights fantastic food general friendliness whilst slightly negative aspects stay would hesitate recommend royal court anyone looking decent quiet accommodation perfectly acceptable standard expensive city getting negatives way first room standard really quite tight space said quite room space used maximum eg large wall mounted plasma tv drawers within wardrobe etc suspect room amongst smallest hotel could well find something spacious secondly although continental style breakfasts perfectly satisfactory tables could full certain times short wait bit night didnt seem bar area though believe drinks could arranged however lack obvious lounge put us nightcap downstairs real worries rome full wonderful bars restaurants near hotel tend around 15 20 minutes walk away main maybe negative issue bit hotel arranging car meet us airport originally planned take train termini station 7 minute safe walk away however became obvious flight going delayed beyond midnight trains would running phoned hotel admittedly last minute airport arrange hotel car pick alas show matter friendly taxi driver took us hotel similar price 60 euros midnight none way stay get really good value check hotel prices rooms clean requests eg pillows dealt efficiently little corridor noise slept well desk staff really excellent helpful brilliant english location really good nice quiet area appeared safe us stated station hop away great metro tour buses well airport transit provided midnight also pretty good seeing sights maybe 20 minute walk trevi fountain spanish steps half hour pantheon vatican probably needs taxi hop city tour bus also recommend trastevere area many tour bus routes plenty excellent restaurants coming trendy part town summary genuinely recommend hotel anyone looking best value expecting 5 star facilities 3 star prices youll disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommend this charming hotel”
Reviews.Author: DesignatedPlanner
Reviews.Content: nice reasonably priced hotel good location room small 3 feet space round bed room new lcd tv clean nice breakfast good see photo front desk spoke good english female staff front desk definitely friendly helpful good choice cheap hotel rome

Reviews.Title: “Jacuzzi!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: great location youre planning fly rome visit attractions foot convenience liked location much better luxury hotels land airport simply jump leonardo express train 11 euros way takes right downtown termini station hotel 5 minute walk straight street actually see station soon walk hotel best way tour attractions bath coliseum trevi fountain vatican subway main hub subway termini station great hotel close 24 hour front desk staff spoke english free breakfast safe inside outside hotel rooms recently renovated within past couple years clean housekeeping fantastic everything refilled clean towels provided everyday even though hung overall complaint free breakfast although probably complain something provided european wasnt north americans used orange juice milk warm typical eggs basically coffee pastries yogurt sliced meats remember termini station 5 min away tons restaurants yes even mcdonalds
